rows.label: bf11880100_0010
rows.name: You won't come back?

rows.label: bf11880100_0020
rows.name: This is the path I must walk.

rows.label: bf11880100_0030
rows.name: Our paths will not cross again.

rows.label: bf11880100_0050
rows.name: But...

rows.label: bf11880100_0060
rows.name: If we do happen to meet again,

rows.label: bf11880100_0070
rows.name: on that day...

rows.label: bf11880100_0075
rows.name: Iira - The Golden Country

rows.label: bf11880100_0080
rows.name:
Nintendo and MONOLITHSOFT are the authors of this 
software for the purpose of copyright. All rights reserved.

rows.label: bf11880100_0090
rows.name: © 2017 Nintendo / MONOLITHSOFT / rsc-pl - Fan Translation

rows.label: bf11870100_0010
rows.name: In the span of a person's life...

rows.label: bf11870100_0020
rows.name: how many times must one meet and part with others?

rows.label: bf11870100_0030
rows.name: In that moment, as the flame of life flickers out,

rows.label: bf11870100_0040
rows.name: whose face comes to mind?

rows.label: bf11870100_0050
rows.name: With that smile in their mind,

rows.label: bf11870100_0060
rows.name: anyone who can pass on is surely happy.

rows.label: bf11870100_0070
rows.name: That's right...

rows.label: bf11870100_0080
rows.name: I don't need eternity.

rows.label: bf11870100_0090
rows.name: Even if it's just for a moment,

rows.label: bf11870100_0100
rows.name: if we are together, that is enough...

rows.label: bf11870100_0110
rows.name: However...

rows.label: bf11870100_0120
rows.name: what should one who has lost that chance do...?

rows.label: bf11870100_0130
rows.name: The road stretches on endlessly.

rows.label: bf11870100_0140
rows.name: I will keep walking.

rows.label: bf11870100_0150
rows.name:
Believing that if I keep walking this path,
someday I'll reach the end...

rows.label: bf11870100_0160
rows.name: that the day will come when I can see her smile again.

rows.label: bf11870100_0170
rows.name: Believing that...
